column4: Hi there, how can I delete the 'open with' application in firefox, because the default app is no longer installed on my pc?
There's usually a "Remember my selection" once you choose an app
I want to open with Transmission, but I do not know how to add it to the list.
It's not in the default droplist?
the default is currently Vuze, but I have installed it. I can go 'Other', but do not know wherer to find Transmission.
/usr/bin are where most binaries are if I recall correctly.
Yes, I have found it! Now how do I delete Vuze as I already uninstalled it, but it still shows default? Can I delete the entire .azureus folder?
I would delete whatever of it you could find (I'd say .azurreus sounds about right) in ~ and in /usr/share
Sometimes configs are left behind... Usually an uninstall + deleting whatever's hidden in your home directory is enough though

(Note: Not always in both places. Usually just one, but I, personally, like to check in both. Also, by the way, "sudo apt-get purge <packagename>" deletes all configs for you too, as opposed to "sudo apt-get remove <packagename>" which is what the Software Center does)
I have already deleted the filed in /usr/share, but now I also deleted the folder in home.  Thanks for your help
Is it gone from the list now like you wanted?
No, it is still there as default, but now transmission is there too.
Alright. Well, I'm not really sure what to say regarding getting Vuze out of there, but at least you've got Transmission now. :)
Exactly, that little achievment makes me happy :)
And you learned some neat things too! :) Learning is always fun.
that is why I like ubuntu!
